subject: Tennis
Coaches and Managers
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Gaël Monfils is one of the game’s most unpredictable talents, and while many of his rivals have one or two coaches, for now, he has none at all.
snippet: Gaël Monfils is one of the game’s most unpredictable talents, and while many of his rivals have one or two coaches, for now, he has none at all.
